Comprehensive Bounty Page








Introduction

Welcome to the example page! This is what the bounty pages will look like. Confused? No worries, I can handle the writing all by myself, and you only have to worry about giving me the information I need to populate this area, and can otherwise rest easy knowing your bounties are going to be seen by the best and brightest hunters in the land.

Confused about those images at the top of the page? No worries, those are requirements badges, stuff I add to make things easier for you to make sure your hunters bring what they need to the job, physical and otherwise.


Usage

Usage is a rather funny thing. To use this bounty board, as a bounty hunter, just look at it and follow the bounties, click on links to get to pages like this, and contact the bounty givers if requested. If you're a bounty giver yourself, send some info my way and I'll post it up on the board for all the Galaxy to see.
